tweet: The bear market was necessary. The easy money and overvaluations needed to stop. It was completely out of hand and unsustainable. Most of these coin need to and will die. Make sure you are positioned correctly for the trend reversal because not everything is going back up. $LINK

Not gonna lie, I have more confidence in Chainlink than I do Bitcoin. Not saying I don't believe Bitcoin will become a store of value, but I have much more confidence in smart contract adoption than cryptocurrency adoption.

Most people just think about blockchain as currency to spend. This is very limited understanding, akin to thinking the Internet is just for email. The bulk of the value is in interoperability and smart contracts for an autonomous, frictionless economy. $LINK unlocks this reality.

“When they show that completed contract to people they can say...here’s my highly reliable end-to-end smart contract that you should feel comfortable putting money into because it’s so well made, using ChainLink” - Sergey Nazarov  Simple, yet profound.   $LINK  https://t.co/6pcynyg4I3
